title: HTTPS - Phase I
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to have the option to browse the website via an encrypted connection\
So I can be sure that all my requests are actually going through the More Cars servers\
And are not intercepted or manipulated
description:
* every page is accessible via HTTPS, e.g. `https://more-cars.net/brands`
* in this iteration every route is also still available via HTTP, e.g. `http://more-cars.net/brands`
* there are no automatic redirects from one protocol to the other
